channel.title: puppet on Joe Miller
channel.description: Recent content in puppet on Joe Miller

item.title: Correlating Puppet changes to events in your infrastructure using graphite
item.description: Sometimes it is pretty obvious when Puppet changes something in your infrastructure and bad things happen in a big dramatic way. Other times it’s not so obvious. It can be invaluable to be able to correlate changes made by Puppet to other events happening in your infrastructure.
